title: Cold Prevention Food!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Chika-chaaan! Look, here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waaah! Mikan sandwiches!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You taught me that mikan can help prevent colds, remember? So I thought it would be great if we could have mikan as lunch and made these~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s amazing! Can I have some?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course! Dig in♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>*Munch*.... Hnn~, it’s so good~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, I’m glad to hear that♪ But I don’t really know what else to make with mikan other than sandwiches. I might get bored if I keep making sandwiches all the time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fufufu~. Leave it to me! You see, you can also use mikan in hotpots or ramen~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’ll treat you to some as thanks for the sandwich! With that said, let’s go~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
